data.text: “Umwene wo wiirimu unolhikaana ni ntu aari ni imata yo zabibu, aalhawenlhe wichishuru waavaha attu ntheko umatani wawe.
Nkeewanana waalhiva thoko chaari aya chilhiviyaka, nchurukhu idinari imoka wo nihuku, nkaarweha u imata awe yo zabibu.
Vaari aya saa tatu wichishu, nkaarwa weehanani attu akina, nkoona attu ahirina ntheko aneemenlhe wo uhikhalha ni ntheko vanopangiya maronda,
nkeerelhacha, ‘Nrweeke ni inyu mwaattiva mwavareke ntheko imata yo zabibu, ni mii kinoulhivani iri ye ikekhiaye.’
Paahi nkayaarwaa. Saa sita uthana ni saa tisa nkeera chiicho.
Ata vaari aya saa khumi ni moja uchechilho, nkaarwa tho, nkaaphwanya attu akina anemelhanche vasokoni vawo. ‘Paahi nkaakoha, woonaka nhowemelhacha vaa uthana wonkhaye ulha wo uhikhalha ntheko?’
Nkayamwaakulha, ‘Khaawo ntu nivanhe ntheko.’ Ni uyo nkeerelhacha nrwaacheke ni inyu mwaattiva mwavare ntheko imata yo zabibu.”

“Weelhekeru, mwanene imata yo zabibu nkanlhehera ntu noshunga nhakhu awe, ‘Mweehane attu ammara ntheko umatani ayo, mwaalhiveke malhivo aya, mpacheraka waalhiva attu awilhee katashi, ni wamalhihera o upacha alhe.’
Attu yaachokhonlhe ntheko saa khumi ni moja nkayaalhiviya nchurukhu idinari imoka kila mmoka.
Attu o upacha yaweeke, aari yaanyiheraka wiira anohalha ulhiviya waapwaha akina, nansho ata ni ayo yaavahiye kila mmoka idinari imoka.
Nkayaakhelha nchurukhu aya, ni unchukulhachera mwanene ntheko.
Nkayeera, ‘Attu avahiye ntheko katashi apannge ntheko wo isaa imoka tu, woonaka nnilhivilhe thoko yayo uno hii ninavilhenlhe ntheko woorika uthana wonkhaye niviaka nchuwa!’
“Vavawo mwanene ntheko nkaamwaakhulha mmoka aya, ‘Mpwana, akupangenlheni chittu cho uhilhoka. Chani, khanewananne ni mii malhivo o idinari imoka?
Nkusheke iri yawinyu, nrweeke. Kihothanana ummaha ulha o umalhihera thoko nlhiviye inyu inyuva.
Chani kinopanga ittu yo uhilhoka upanga chiicho wo nhakhu aka, thoko chinothanana aka? Ama nnoona ihache wo nlhatu no ukhalha ni nrima worera?’ ”
Yesu nkaamalhiha wo wiira, “Chiicho, arii o umalhihera anowa ukhalha o upacha, ni o upacha anowa ukhalha o umalhihera.”
Yesu vaari awe awelhaka urwaa Uyerusalemu, ahaattukana owiittucha awe khumi ni elhi ni waarerihana wo ntemera mphironi.

Nkeerelha, “Mwiiwelhelheke, vano ninokelha Uyerusalemu, wowo Mwaana a Ntu nokoohelhiya mmathathani mwa attu opochera ishaani olhupalhe ni owiittuchiha Malhehero a ashinna Musa. Ni ayo anonhukumulha wiira eeviye
ni uvahiya attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku, ampangelhe ncheche ni umwaata ikopo ni unkhomelhelha vansalaabani, nansho nihuku no neraru noohihimmwa.”
Vavawo anumwanaya ashaana a Nazebedayo yahonrwelha Yesu vamoka ni ashaana aya, nkaakhoroma vaari awe ni unlhepelha nlhove.
Yesu nkaakoha “Nnothananani?”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “Khanchuwenlhe ittu inolhepelha inyu, chani, nnowooria uwureria ikikombe yo ntwarusho inohalha aka uwureria mii?”

Yesu nkaahimeria wiira, “Wo ikekhiaye nnowureria ikikombe aka, nansho akirina ikuru yo unthanlha nohalha ukhalha wiimonono ama wiimushi waka. Yayo mapuro ayo anohalha uvahiya attu eesheriye tayari ni Athumwanaka.”
Owiittucha akina khumi alhe yeeweke yoyo mwaha uyo, nkayaarushiya nkayaathunalhelha yayo ashilhoko elhi ayo.
Paahi Yesu nkeehanacha, nkaahimeria wiira, “Nnoochuwelha wiira attu anaatawara attu ahinchuwenlhe Nlhuku, anaatawara attu wo machiri, ni nholhelhi aya aatawaraka attu aya.
Nansho ihikalhe chiicho uwaninyu mwaattiva, namitheko nothanana ukhalha mulhupalhe munlhokoni mwinyu hothananiya ukhalha namitheko inyu,
ni ntu nothanana ukhalha o upacha nhina mwinyu hothananiya ukhalha ipotta inyu.
Wo yeyo iphiro iyo etu, Mwaana a Ntu khaawilhe awe aapangelhiya mitheko ni attu, nansho ukaviherani ni ukumiha ukumi awe ukhalha noopo wa attu akina.”
Yesu vaathama awe iwani yo Uyeriko, nlhoko wa attu wahonttwara.
Paahi ahokhalha attu ohoona elhi yaakhanlhe vachereshere iphiro, yeeweke wiira Yesu noovira vavawo, nkayaakhuwelha, “Thithi, Mwaana a Adaudi, unoonelhe ikiriri!”
Nlhoko wa attu nkawaachiichiha ni waamaalhiha. Nansho ayo nkayaathepa ukhuwelha, “Thithi Mwaana a Adaudi nnoonelhe ikiriri!”
Yesu nkeemelha nkeehana ni waakoha “Nnothanana kupangelhekeni ittu yaani?”
Nkayaaamwakulha, “Thithi ninolhepelha miitho ihu apatakuwe!”
Paahi etu Yesu nkoona ikiriri, nkaatonya miitho aya, ni vavawo nkayoona tho, nkayanttwara.
